text: Background : Cyclooxygenase - 2 - derived prostaglandin E 2 ( PGE 2 ) , a bioactive eicosanoid , has been implicated in many biological processes including reproduction , inflammation and tumor growth . We previously showed that PGE 2 stimulated lung cancer cell growth and progression through PGE 2 receptor EP2 / EP4 - mediated kinase signaling pathways . However , the role of PGE 2 in controlling lung airway epithelial cell phenotype remains unknown . We evaluated the effects of c - Jun and 3 - phosphoinositede dependent protein kinase - 1 ( PDK1 ) in mediating epithelial cell hyperplasia induced by PGE 2 .
